text:
I have a Mac and every 10 seconds I get this message in "Console". I have no idea what is Apache, nor 
do I know how to remove and solve the problem. Please help
Thanks
Bob L.

12/23/07 2:44:07 AM org.apache.httpd[5785] Unable to open logs 
12/23/07 2:44:07 AM com.apple.launchd[1] (org.apache.httpd[5785]) Exited with exit code: 1 
12/23/07 2:44:07 AM com.apple.launchd[1] (org.apache.httpd) Throttling respawn: Will start in 10 
seconds 
12/23/07 2:44:17 AM org.apache.httpd[5786] (2)No such file or directory: httpd: could not open error 
log file /private/var/log/apache2/error_log.
creator: bo.blane@hotmail.com

text: Nothing to do with us.  Looks like you haven't got apache installed.
creator: nick@webthing.com
bo.blane@hotmail.com
text:
Any suggestions how to eliminate these error messages?


(In reply to comment #1)
> Nothing to do with us.  Looks like you haven't got apache installed.

This is not a bug.  If you need help with Apache HTTPd, which it looks like you
do, then please read this page and use which ever method suits you best:

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/faq/


Cheers,
Tony
creator: tony@pc-tony.com
